name: Extract Abbreviations and Technical Terms (Standardized Fields)
description: Extract English abbreviations and technical terms from text.
template:
Read the input text and generate a JSON according to the requirements.

【Task Scope】
- Extract both:
  1) English abbreviations/codes/models: composed of Latin letters, digits, hyphens, dots, or slashes, length 2–20, preserve original case and symbols;
  2) Technical terms: related to engineering, technology, military, aerospace, computing/AI, organizations & systems, plans/projects; can be multi-word phrases.

【Fields & Constraints (Whitelist)】
- Each entry must contain:
  - name: the fragment 【exactly as in the text】; keep case, spaces, hyphens, dots, slashes as-is;
  - description: 12–30 words in English providing an objective explanation;
- Optional fields:
  - abbr: if it is an abbreviation/code/model, fill in the abbreviation as in the text (usually the same as name);
  - full: only if the text 【explicitly provides】 the full form (use exactly as in the text);
- Strictly forbid outputting any fields other than name/description/abbr/full/zh.

【Splitting & Merging Prohibition】
- Do not merge multiple entries: when encountering multiple abbreviations/models/codes connected by “/ , and or” (e.g., “550W/550A”, “X-15B/C”, “AB-1 and AB-2”), you must 【split into separate entries】.
- Never generate a name that contains merging symbols (such as “/”, “and”) referring to two or more objects.

【Name Consistency Rule】
- name must be a 【complete, continuous】 fragment from the original text, character-for-character identical (including case, spaces, hyphens, dots, slashes, etc.). Do not rewrite, correct, or normalize name.

【Abbreviation & Full Form Handling】
- When encountering “full form (abbr)” or “abbr (full form)” structures: use the abbreviation as the main entry; only extract the full form as a separate entry if it is independently used and has technical value.
- Do not take “full form (abbr)” as the whole name.

【Normalization Scope】
- description and zh may be normalized for clarity, but name must not be changed.
- abbr should only be filled if it is indeed an abbreviation/code/model; full should only be filled if the original text explicitly contains the full form.

【Filtering & Boundaries】
- Exclude: abbreviations related to film/stage/audio production (e.g., O.S./OS, V.O./VO); plain “number+unit” (e.g., 10km, 3dB, 9G); generic words without specific reference (e.g., technology, system used generically); personal names (not organizations).
- The total number of extracted entries should not exceed 15.

【Deduplication】
- Deduplicate strictly by 【exact name match (case and punctuation sensitive)】; keep the more complete version.
- Correct: original “550W/550A” → 550W and 550A
- Incorrect: {{"name":"550W/550A", ...}} (forbidden)

【Current Background Information】
{current_background}

【Output Format】
```json
{{
  "abbreviations": [
    {{ "name": "...", "description": "...", "abbr": "...", "full": "...", "zh": "..." }}
  ]
}}
```
